arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the upper left corner of the oval to draw.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the upper left corner of the oval to draw.

arguments.name: width
arguments.description: The width of the oval to draw.

arguments.name: height
arguments.description: The height of the oval to draw.

arguments.name: filled
arguments.description:
Specify whether the oval is filled:
- true: The oval is filled with the specified drawing color.
- false (default): Only the outline of the oval is drawn.
